articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish football could be dominated by the future of Ange Postecoglou at Celtic with reports he is set to become the new Spurs boss with the Scottish Cup final on the horizon. It could be the biggest story of the summer, while clubs look to make key moves in the transfer market.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers starlet among 9 to exit, Aberdeen's Clarkson wait, Hibs in line for windfall

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Alistair Johnston insists Celtic players are blocking out the speculation surrounding Ange Postecoglou's future amid reports the Australian is being lined up to become the next manager of Tottenham.
articles.title: 'We have Sky Sports on' - Celtic dressing room reaction to Ange Postecoglou exit talk

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has confirmed Aaron Mooy will miss Celtic’s Scottish Cup final against Inverness CT but delivered positive news on three team-mates.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou delivers positive Celtic team news on trio - but confirms star to miss Scottish Cup final

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has refused to drawn on reports linking him with an imminent move to Tottenham as he insisted his full focus is on Saturday's Scottish Cup final.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou reacts to Spurs move claims as Celtic boss insists: 'I woke up thinking of one thing'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic could be set to lose Ange Postecoglou as manager with reports Tottenham Hotspur will announce the Australian as their new boss next week.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Spurs 'to announce' Celtic boss next week with Parkhead replacement search 'underway'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The 26 teams which automatically qualify for the Champions League group stages have all been confirmed – including Celtic.
articles.title: Celtic one of 26 Champions League group stage entrants, 8 to qualify including Rangers, big names, draw details

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The 26 teams which automatically qualify for the Champions League group stages have all been confirmed – including Celtic.
articles.title: Celtic one of confirmed 26 Champions League group stage entrants, 8 via qualifiers to be decided including Rangers

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Matt O’Riley has encouraged supporters to trust the process as Celtic target a fifth treble in seven seasons – and a world record eighth in total.
articles.title: How Celtic can land world record at Hampden and open 20-year gap to Rangers

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Humza Yousaf has opened up on his support of Celtic and joked he would try to use ministerial powers to prevent manager Ange Postecoglou leaving for Tottenham.
articles.title: Humza Yousaf opens up on Celtic support as First Minister addresses Ange Postecoglou exit fears

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Tuesday, June 6. A quick glance at the football calendar and there are no fixtures taking place within the Scottish football pyramid. For a football fix you will have to venture to the Copa Libertadores, South Korea’s K-League 1 or a play-off final in the Netherlands. Yet, it will be a big day in Scotland.
articles.title: How Scottish football's Conference League plans are starting to unravel - votes against, fan power and D-Day

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Premiership clubs have been confirming the players who will be remaining as part of the squad going into next season, while the search for a new club begins for a variety of players around the country in what is set to be a fascinating summer transfer window.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers star in surprise Turkey link, £5m Celtic target set to leave, 'fee agreed' for Hibs ace

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic are facing the prospect of a possible approach for Ange Postecoglou amid growing reports that their treble-chasing manager is the number one candidate to replace Antonio Conte at Tottenham.
articles.title: Celtic braced for Ange Postecoglou approach as Tottenham prepare to 'step up' interest for 'preferred candidate'

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur will “step up” their interest in Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou after Saturday's Scottish Cup final, according to a report.
articles.title: Celtic braced for Ange Postecoglou approach as Tottenham prepare to 'step up' interest

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou is relishing the challenge of improving Celtic again next season after warning that the club could lose key players this summer.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou warns of incoming offers and reveals why managing Celtic is akin to Jenga

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: A number of Premiership clubs are confirming the players who will be departing at the end of their contracts following the conclusion of the season as managers begin to tweak and overhaul their squad ahead of pre-season.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Hearts in target blow, 44-goal ex-Rangers released, Hibs defender joins Premiership rivals

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: A total of 3,834,106 fans attended Scottish Premiership games this season with the average attendance across the league 16,816.
articles.title: Celtic surpass impressive attendance milestone as Premiership average attendances revealed in record season

articles.author: Anthony Brown
articles.description: Billy Dodds declared Inverness “ready to go” for Saturday’s Scottish Cup final even though they will have had more than four weeks without a match by the time the Hampden showdown with Celtic kicks off.
articles.title: Billy Dodds responds to Celtic form question with Inverness situation branded 'not ideal, but not terrible'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic are set for a second season of Champions League group stage football after winning the Scottish Premiership title.
articles.title: Celtic's slim Champions League Pot 3 hope - and why Rangers are one of the teams they want eliminated

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has been urged not to swap Celtic and Champions League football for the English Premier League’s “great non-achievers”.

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Manchester United, Internazionale and Scotland. Three teams whose short-term ambitions hinge on being able to shackle a pony-tailed phenomenon called Erling Haaland.

articles.author: Chris Andrews
articles.description: Celtic defender Carl Starfelt believes it is “not fair” to judge team-mate Yuki Kobayashi after just a handful of games.

articles.description: Celtic could struggle to land striker Levi Garcia after an AEK Athens chief revealed the club don’t want to sell him this summer.
articles.title: Celtic suffer blow in chase for £13m-rated star as clubs make moves for Rangers duo

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Now that the Premiership season has finished most clubs can switch their full attention to pre-season, preparation and the summer transfer market with all clubs looking to do key business before competitive action returns in July with the Viaplay Cup group stages.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: New deal for Rangers star, Celtic eye £3.5m international, Aberdeen battle to sign favourite

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Sky Sports provided live coverage of 41 Scottish Premiership matches this season – but failed to take up the full allocation of 48 for the third year running.

articles.description: Last season Ange Postecoglou brought the house down at Celtic Park on trophy day with his promise to be back after a summer hiatus bigger and better than ever before.
